name: e.l.f., Monochromatic Multi Stick, Creamy, Lightweight, Versatile, Luxurious, Adds Shimmer, Easy To Use On The Go, Blends Effortlessly, Sparkling Rose, 0.17 Oz
about_this_item: PERFECT PIGMENT: Use this shimmery, luxuriously blendable cream-to-powder stick as your eyeshadow, lipstick, and blush for a cohesive monochromatic look. The lightweight formula makes it virtually mistake-proof and perfect for touch-ups on the go.
HOW TO WEAR: Apply to eyes, lips, and cheeks, and blend with a brush or fingertips. Use alone or as a base for powder products for even longer-lasting color.
100% CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN: Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.
All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified
BEAUTY FOR ALL: e.l.f. Cosmetics provides professional-quality products at get-real prices, because we believe beauty should be accessible to every eye, lip, and face.

title: Love it!
content: This is great! I have always used the powder blush and figured why not try something new. So glad I did! It goes on easy and blends in nice with a brush. I actually like it better than the powder blush! Highly recommend!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This is my favorite blush. It’s a super pretty color with a tiny bit of shimmer. It’s buildable and easy to blend. I don’t like it much as a lip color as it’s a little too light and highlights any dryness. Cute as an eyeshadow. I’ve bought four of these and will continue to buy them as long as they’re sold!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024

title: I adore this product
content: I bought this product for my Mom who is in her 80’s but still very stylish and pretty. It is smooth and silky with great color, so it is simple and easy for her to use plus it looks great on her.  I would recommend this for anyone who wants just a pop-up color anywhere on their face from their cheeks to their lips!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

It’s very sheer looking, but gives you that nice little tint at the same time. You don’t look like a clown and I also love how compact it is because you could just throw it in any wristlet bag.

title: Verified Purchase

Es practico para las que no queremos tomar tiempo en el maquillado diario o para los que no nos gusta cargar con tantos maquillajes. Son cremosos y se sienten bien a la piel. El producto llegó a tiempo y según las indicaciones por el vendedor. Buen producto.

title: Maquillaje
content: This has really sped up my time in front of the mirror. The monochrome color for lips, cheeks and eyes works for me. The Sparkling Rose color is a really great color. I've reached an age where I'm only interested in what makes me happy with myself. Part of that has been simplifying my makeup routine. I use the Dermatology universal tinted moisturizer, The E.L.F. multi-stick for my lips, cheeks and eyes, and a setting spray. Thats all I need. If it's a special occasion I may use an under eye concealer.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I use these every day for blush and sometimes eyeshadow. If I'm applying it as blush, I just use my hands. For eyeshadow, I use brushes. This product plays well with other products. I use it on top of sunscreen, lotion, and other skincare and it looks great and lasts all day. Once you are blending it, it feels and acts like a super fine powder blush, but lasts longer and is more durable. Super easy to throw one of these into your bag for a weekend trip with some mascara and a lip gloss.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This small product seems like it wouldn't last very long, but it definitely lasts, even doing makeup everyday. The color is correct, and looks nice on pale skin like my own. Use one of those circle puffs with a small handle on one half and dab it onto cheeks; set with powder blush. This would be nice for someone who likes natural makeup, as the pigment isn't insane and the product only gets covered easily by powder on top. Blendable, affordable, and worth it. Will be ordering again.

title: I love her
content: I use this product on top of primer, but I do not use with a setting powder.  The color is so good and I love how easy and forgiving it is to apply.  I often use it on my face and eyelids with little other makeup and it gives a great look.  The only issue is that it does not last.  After a few hours, it is all but disappeared off my face.  At the end of the day, I can't even find traces it of it on my cleansing pad!  If you don't mind reapplication or if you want to just try it, I still recommend you do.  The price is great, the look is great so it is worth a try!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love this blush. The color is beautiful and goes with any skin tone. I purchased to use for a wedding that my family and I attending to. I did my daughters, my sister and my own makeup. Simple makeup and it looked fabulous on all of us. We are Latina's of different skin tones.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024
